title: As someone whos been playing since S3....
body:
I can honestly say that Riot is slowly giving every other country more love then the one they started in. NA is the last from most updates, we are generally the last to hear new things. Also, from what i see on the boards, they dont generally care about what NA says on it, good or bad. 

Now... am i the only one seeing this as a thing? or is it just all the Riot hate lately has started to affect me as well?
